"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Then we easily see that B = 9, the one carries over so A = 6, the one carries over again so C= 2."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

title: 1998 AHSME Problem 4
body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Define [a, b, c] to mean (a+b)/c, where c is not equal to 0. What is the value of"}]},{"type":"text","text":"\n\n"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"[[60, 30, 90], [2, 1, 3], [10, 5, 15]] ?"}]}]}
